content.value:
✨IMPORTANT PSA✨

You are not a bad person for not doing chores. There's no morality attached to clean dishes/stacks of dirty ones. There's no punishment for not being able to tackle any housework. Don't feel bad about not having the energy right now. It's okay. You're okay.💛
content.html: ✨IMPORTANT PSA✨ You are not a bad person for not doing chores. There's no morality attached to clean dishes/stacks of dirty ones. There's no punishment for not being able to tackle any housework. Don't feel bad about not having the energy right now. It's okay. You're okay.💛
